description: Thermopneumatic Processing Plant? Why such a long name?

The /b/Thermopneumatic Processing Plant/b/ (/b/TPP/b/ from now on) is your first real machine. The /b/TPP/b/ takes in items and fluids, and when /6/given suitable pressure/6/, processes them into something else.
There are /b/fluid dump buttons/b/ inside if you need to get rid of any excess fluid stuck inside.
You may notice the /b/tempature gauge/b/ on in the /b/TPP/b/. This isn't nessary for all recipes, but some will require the /6/tempature to be above, below, or within a certain range/6/.
Placing hot or cold /b/blocks adjacent/b/ will /6/adjust the tempature/6/.
